name: 10 Seconds to Explode
description:
ADD SOME DESCRIPTIVE TEXT HERE AND FILL IN THE ROLES MORE COMPLETELY

10 Seconds to Explode was developed by a team of 5 during Vancouver Film School's October 2019 Game Jam. We had a 2-Days 50-hour time limit and our theme was "10 Seconds".

  • James Assayag
    • Artist
  • Nick Anderson
    • Level Designer
  • Rodrigo Viera
    • Level Designer
  • Sabastian Peters
    • Programmer & Audio
  • J. Vitor de Brito
    • Programmer

All scripts, audio and visuals were created in the 50 hour time limit. 

Made in Unity3D using Illustrator, Ableton and BFXR.
